segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a typical day, or so it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is cascading down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in water without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me mad how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is grabbing cookies boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is leaning dangerously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet they're sharing the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the wet floor adds to the slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies might spill everywhere if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR
